text: Sir Leonard John Chalstrey (17 March 1931 â€“ 12 March 2020) was a British consultant surgeon. He served as the 668th Lord Mayor of London from 1995 to 1996. In 1995, he was also master apothecary of the Worshipful Society of Apothecaries. Chalstrey died on 12 March 2020, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mayors of London Category:Knights of the Order of St John Category:British surgeons
title: John Chalstrey
